resource.description: A library to be statically linked. Contains many small utilities. This bundle should not be installed in a framework, it is compile only.
This command line utility is the Swiss army knife of OSGi. It provides you with a breadth
Contains only the annotations for bnd.
Contains only the test functions for bnd.
A Swiss Army Knife for OSGi

resource.description: jpm4j is Just another Package Manager for Java. It stills the envy of all Java developers of Ruby with their Gems, Perl with its cpan, and Python with its pips. jpm makes it very easy to deploy Java applications on a myriad of platforms. This program is the command line application that performs the front end of the https://www.jpm4j.org website. It provides full access to the repository index (i.e. jpm find osgi), it can be used to install, etc. Use jpm help to see all the commands.
resource.license: http://www.opensource.org/licenses/apache2.0.php; description="Copyright (c) aQute (2000, 2014). All Rights Reserved."; link=LICENSE
